subject: Entrepreneurship
title: Post-Traumatic Growth: Stronger After the Storm
description: A quick win: understand Post-Traumatic Growth: Stronger After the Storm.

hook.text: After his first company failed spectacularly, Reid Hoffman used every lesson to build LinkedIn.

buildup.text: Post-traumatic growth is the positive psychological change that can emerge after a major life crisis.

discovery.text: Researchers found 70% of trauma survivors report at least one area of significant personal growth.

twist.text: Growth doesn't mean the trauma was good. It means humans can extract meaning from suffering.

climax.text: Oprah Winfrey credits her difficult childhood as the foundation of her empathy and business instincts.

punchline.text: The crack is where the light gets in.

quiz.question: What is post-traumatic growth?
options: Positive psychological change that emerges after struggling with a major crisis
The ability to avoid trauma through careful planning
A therapy technique for treating PTSD
